channel.title: Posts on Zhongqing Han
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zhongqing Han

item.title: SAGES 2017 Annual Meeting
item.description:
Performed face validation of simulator prototype and demonstrated understanding of principles of current diversion using Virtual Reality (HTC VIVE).

Key features:

  • Define direct coupling and explain how it can occur
  • Define capacitive coupling and explain how it can occur
  • Define insulation failure and explain how it can occur

item.title: 9th Annual ACS-AEI Postgraduate Course
item.description: Demonstrated all the modules of VEST. Provided VR simulators session for American college of surgeons- Division of education to enhance patient safety through simulation.

item.title: Long-term visitor at Kitware
item.description: Developed interactive GUI using VTK in the virtual environment and contributed to the Interactive Medical Simulation Toolkit (IMSTK), which is a free & open source software toolkit written in C++ that aids rapid prototyping of interactive multi-modal surgical simulations.

item.title: SAGES 2016 Annual Meeting
item.description: Performed face validation of simulator prototype and demonstrated the principles of current pathway through virtual human and how the dispersive electrode protects the patient.

item.title: Workshop of Innovation, Design and Emerging Alliances in Surgery: Virtual Surgery
item.description: Brainstorm between surgeons, software engineer, graphics expert, physicist on future of Virtual Surgery.
